articles.title: This Singaporean is the first local singer to have a song hit 100 million streams on Spotify - AsiaOne
articles.description: Home-grown singer Sezairi is the first Singaporean artiste to have a song rack up more than 100 million streams on Spotify. The ballad, It's You, was first released as a single in 2018 and was later included in his sophomore EP, Undertones (2020). In 2021, th…
articles.content:

articles.title: Star Awards Top 10 Popular Artistes nominees revealed, Brandon Wong bags his first nom - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: TV veteran Wong earns his first-ever popularity award nomination in a career that spans decades. Also, some fun new awards will be presented backstage this year, like the, erm, dubious honour of Most Attention-seeking New Gen Host.
articles.content: Similarly chuffed to be nominated was Cynthia Koh, who jokingly referenced how shed made headlines in the past year for wearing a daring dress. I know everyone saw that blue dress I wore, and it must… [+618 chars]

articles.title: COE bidding results (March 2022): Drastic increases in premiums across all categories, Cat E at record high - AsiaOne
articles.description: In the 1st COE bidding exercise for March 2022, Cat A closed at $68,501, Cat B at $94,889, Cat C at $48,889, Cat D at $11,400 and Cat E at $98,890. Cat A (Cars up to 1600CC & 97KW) received 962 bids and saw a $5,501 increase from the previous exercise. It clo…

articles.title: 'Turning Red' is a 'love letter' to Asian Canadian girls, says director Domee Shi - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: The Canadian director of Pixar’s latest outing "Turning Red" points to innumerable elements that could have torpedoed her mission to spotlight a Chinese-Canadian girl in Toronto wrestling with puberty.
